answers.answer: I would go see a doctor, it could be a heart problem.

Yes, it could be your heart - or it could be low magnesium.  Some of the symptoms of Magnesium Deficiency are:  Difficulty swallowing or lump in throat sensation,Sensitivity to light,InsomniaAnxietyHyperactivity and restlessnessNumbness and tinglingSpasms of coronary arteries causing palpitations, chest pain, irregular heartbeatSalt and carbohydrate cravingsPremenstrual IrritationBreast tendernessZaps or vibration sensations

Please see a doctor quickly. Those syptoms your having sound very serious and could be heart related. I also had some middle chest pain and neck and sholder pain. Went to the ER and it turned out to be just anxiety attacks. The point is it could be something not so serious or it could be life threating. Either way you don't know, so it always best to get checked out. Wishing you luck ;)

question: i am 31yrs old,i am suffering from chest pains,severe headaches,nausea,tiredness,pain at the back of neck and shoulders'feeling depressed and i have been taking different medicines including pain tables everyday of my life with no luck.can it be High blood pressure/Low blood pressure or diabetes?please help
title: please help
